typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		movie as string,
		title as string,
		genres as string,
		year as string,
		Rating as string,
		{Rotton Tomato} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	wildcardPaths:['output/2514e789-37b9-454a-95f9-6709e85c02e1.txt']) ~> source1
source1 select(mapColumn(
		each(match(name=='movie'),
			'movie' = $$),
		each(match(name=='title'),
			'title' = $$),
		each(match(name=='genres'),
			'genres' = $$),
		each(match(name=='year'),
			'year' = $$),
		each(match(name=='Rating'),
			'Rating' = $$),
		each(match(name=='Rotton Tomato'),
			'Rotten Tomato' = $$)
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 filter(toInteger(year) > 1950) ~> Filter1
